text: Formatted output in OpenOffice/Microsoft Word with Python
I am working on a project (in Python) that needs formatted, editable output.
Since the end-user isn't going to be technically proficient, the output needs to be in a word processor editable format.
The formatting is complex (bullet points, paragraphs, bold face, etc).
Is there a way to generate such a report using Python?
I feel like there should be a way to do this using Microsoft Word/OpenOffice templates and Python, but I can't find anything advanced enough to get good formatting.
